name: Asbotorpsjön
description: Lake with lots of places to sit and relax feel free to explore

name: Asbotorpsjön lake jetty
description: Beautiful lake with lots of nice places to stay and fall in love. The jetty is a wonderful place to sit at the first date

name: Beach in Aachen
description: This is a small beach noone knows and noone ever is. Perfekt for deeptalks with friends, swimming or chilling

name: Bench "Schöne Aussicht"
description: This bench is way up high in the mountains. Thats why its very lonely and you wont be disturbed here. The perfect place to enjoy the sunset on the horizon which you can perfectly see while sitting on the bench. But be aware you need to go down all the way again. To find it, follow the "Schöne Aussicht" signs on the trail

name: Bench at small street in the Forest
description: A bench at a small street infront of an Forest

name: Bench at water Elbe
description: Bench at Hamburgs Yacht Harbour with beautiful view on the Elbe and passing Cargoships

name: Bench at water Elbe 2
description: Bench at Hamburgs Yacht Harbour with beautiful view on the Elbe and passing Cargoships

name: Bench Buchenberg
description: Bench with a Beautiful view on a hill in front of a field with cows

name: Bench in forest
description: Lonely bench at the side of a forest. You can watch horses on the nearby field

name: Bench in forest water view
description: Beautiful view down a hill in a forest on the water

name: Bench Isny Bähnle
description: Bench with a nice view on the fields

name: Bench Worbelescheed
description: Beautiful bench in the middle of nowhere

name: beach at a sea
description: Lonely sea in the middle of a forest, perfekt plac
